name: Delta Force Xtreme 2
description: Enemies lurk in locations around the globe, waiting for the right opportunity to strike. As part of Delta Force, the U.S. Army's most secretive and highly trained unit, you have the skills and the firepower to hunt them down and take them out.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, VISTA (32 & 64) Processor: Pentium 4 Minimum CPU Required Memory: 1 GB or greater required Graphics: Direct3D video card with 64 MB or greater required  DirectXÂ®: DirectX 9.0c or greater required Hard Drive: 2 GB available Sound: Windows compatible sound card Internet: Internet connection required, broadband recommended

reviews.review_text: I still love Novalogic - even DFX2.   DFX2 doesnt bring anything new to the table - it's the same engine that was use in Black Hawk Down, with some improvements (max resolution).   The 'campaign' pales in comparison to the likes of Delta Force, and there are relatively few missions to play through.
Rip off and sound doesnt work
